title: Tory leadership: Next PM will have to grapple with economy quickly
description: While candidates to be PM trade blows many may be wondering whether economic help on offer is enough.

title: Colombia peace deal failing as violent gangs recruit vulnerable children
description: Colombian gangs target vulnerable indigenous communities as 2016 ceasefire deal fails to bring peace.

title: UK hiring slowing down amid economic uncertainty
description: The recruitment blitz that followed the pandemic is cooling, according to a jobs report.

title: Commonwealth Games: Geraint Thomas takes time trial bronze as Fred Wright and Anna Henderson win silver
description: Geraint Thomas says the Commonwealth Games cycling time trial was "not as organised as we're used to" after he recovers from an early crash to take bronze.

title: Commonwealth Games: England's Jack Laugher and Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix win diving golds
description: Jack Laugher and Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix win the first diving titles on offer at the 2022 Commonwealth Games on a golden night for England.

title: Commonwealth Games: Zoe Newson wins powerlifting gold, Olivia Broome silver, while Mark Swan wins silver in men's final
description: England win three medals in the powerlifting finals, including gold for Zoe Newson and silver for Olivia Broome in the women's event and silver for Mark Swan in the men's.

title: France mulls rescue plan for beluga whale stranded in River Seine
description: Experts are puzzled as to why the animal has strayed so far south from its natural habitat.

title: The Hundred - London Spirit v Oval Invincibles: Eoin Morgan stars in plays of the day
description: Watch the best of Thursday's action in The Hundred as London Spirit beat the Oval Invincibles by three runs.

title: Premier League 2022-23: Everything you need to know as new season starts
description: The Premier League season begins on Friday, a week earlier than last year with the winter World Cup in mind. Here is what to expect this season.

title: The Indian photographer 'expelled' from Uganda by Idi Amin
description: Fifty years being expelled from Uganda by Idi Amin, a photographer spoke to us about his experience.

title: Commonwealth Games: 17-year-old Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix wins diving gold for England
description: Watch 17-year-old Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix win gold for England in the women's 10m platform final on day seven of the 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Aamir Khan: Forrest Gump gets Bollywood treatment
description: Aamir Khan tells BBC World how the iconic 'life is like a box of chocolates' line was adapted for new audiences.

title: Turing sculpture approved for Cambridge college
description: The wartime codebreaker Alan Turing studied at King's College, Cambridge, from 1931.

title: Commonwealth Games: 'An education in what esports actually is'
description: Elite players say a competitive gaming trial at the Commonwealth Games is a 'significant moment'.

title: Quiz of the week: Batgirl film canned - but what's her name?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what's been going on over the past seven days?

title: Commonwealth Games: Diver belly flops in men's one metre springboard preliminary
description: Watch as Sri Lankan diver Dulanjan Kaushalya Fernando belly flops into the pool during the men's 1m springboard preliminary rounds on day seven of the 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Original Lioness: 'It would be nice to have an FA cap'
description: Pat Firth played in the first official women's international football match in England in 1973.

title: Commonwealth Games: Jamaica earn netball victory over top seeds Australia
description: Jamaica earn a superb 57-55 victory over netball top seeds Australia to finish top of Pool A at the Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.

title: Mark Cavendish: Island of Man rider quits Tour of Poland to focus on Commonwealth Games
description: Isle of Man rider Mark Cavendish quits the Tour of Poland at stage six to focus on the Commonwealth Games road race.

title: Taiwan tensions: China condemns 'manic' visit as Pelosi continues tour
description: "Manic, irresponsible and irrational": China's foreign minister reacts to Nancy Pelosi's Taiwan visit.

title: Bank of England warns the UK will fall into recession this year
description: The UK is expected to shrink until the end of 2023 in the longest downturn since the financial crisis.

title: Archie Battersbee: Family seek permission for hospice move
description: A High Court hearing will decide if the 12-year-old can be moved to a hospice.

title: Uganda: Midwife recalls delivering dictator Idi Amin's baby
description: Yasmin Lalani met the murderous ruler as she cared for his wife before fleeing Uganda 50 years ago.

title: Watch: China launches missiles in Taiwan drills
description: The move by Beijing is in response to a recent visit to the island by US Speaker Nancy Pelosi.

title: Jack Woodley: Nine teens appeal against convictions for murder
description: Ten teenagers were convicted of murdering Jack Woodley, who was kicked, punched and fatally stabbed.

title: Ukraine war: No sleep in Ukraine’s relentlessly bombed city
description: Sleep is near impossible in Mykolaiv, the southern port under almost constant Russian attack.

title: China's missiles 'imitating North Korea' - Taiwan
description: China launched 11 ballistic missiles into the sea around Taiwan's coast, Taiwan says.

title: Ukraine: Teenager gets a home in Oxford after fleeing war
description: After fleeing the war in Ukraine, Anastasia and her family have been provided with a new home in Oxford.

title: 'Rate rise means I owe £250 a month more on loans'
description: Four people explain the change in their circumstances due to the rise in interest rates.

title: Batgirl: Directors shocked at film's cancellation
description: Adil El Arbi and Bilall Fallah said it had been a dream to work on the now-shelved movie.

title: The view from Taiwan: 'We've had this for 70 years'
description: "They're a bunch of gangsters," says one man fishing on the dockside, as Chinese missiles fly nearby.

title: How news interviews helped solve Soham murders case
description: Journalists reported Soham murderer Ian Huntley's odd answers to police after Holly and Jessica went missing.

title: Tenerife: Man from Cardiff dies in suspected drowning
description: Nicky Desmond went swimming off the coast of south Tenerife on the first day of his holiday.

title: World Triathlon approves transgender policy with tighter regulations
description: World Triathlon will allow transgender athletes to continue competing in female categories if they meet certain criteria.

title: Lady Gaga: Dog robber suspect arrested after mistaken release
description: James Howard Jackson, 19, is arrested five months after a "clerical error" and his mistaken release.

title: Commonwealth Games: Eilish McColgan's gold is better than mine, says mum Liz
description: The Scottish athlete emulates the success of her mother who also won Commonwealth gold in the 10,000m.

title: Energy bills to rise and fall quicker to avoid price shocks
description: Customers "face a very challenging winter ahead", says regulator, as it updates bills every three months.

description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer expects some familiar foes to fight it out in the title race.

title: Race to save Iron Age settlement in Orkney from the sea
description: Archaeologists are working to save the remains of an Iron Age roundhouse in Orkney.

title: Batgirl filming wasted a month of our business
description: Shop owners in Glasgow affected by the production are frustrated following the film's cancellation.

title: Dylan Holliday death: The armed killer not spotted by social workers
description: The mother of a teenage stabbing victim asks whether more could have been done to prevent the killing.
